movies.title: Il Fauno di marmo
movies.plot: The story unfolds from the discovery, by Kenyon, of an anonymous 19th century diary, in which appear the figures of four friends similar to Kenyon, Miriam, Hilda and Donatello. The uncanny resemblances make the friends seem doomed to relive a mystery which took place a hundred years previously. During a visit to the catacombs, Miriam encounters a mysterious, pale, ghostlike figure wearing a black cape, to whom they refer thereafter as "the Persecutor", and who appears to exercise an inexplicable hold on Miriam.
movies.simplePlot: The story unfolds from the discovery, by Kenyon, of an anonymous 19th century diary, in which appear the figures of four friends similar to Kenyon, Miriam, Hilda and Donatello. The uncanny ...

biography.bio: Marina Malfatti was born on April 25, 1933 in Florence, Tuscany, Italy as Marisa Malfatti. She was an actress, known for The Night Evelyn Came Out of the Grave (1971), La belle et le cavalier (1967) and The Red Queen Kills Seven Times (1972). She was married to Umberto La Rocca. She died on June 8, 2016 in Rome, Italy.
biography.name: Marina Malfatti

biography.bio: Orso Maria Guerrini was born on October 25, 1943 in Florence, Tuscany, Italy. He is an actor, known for The Bourne Identity (2002), The Conformist (1970) and Keoma (1976). He has been married to Cristina Sebastianelli since August 4, 2011. He was previously married to Alessandra Carella and Catherine Spaak.
biography.name: Orso Maria Guerrini

biography.bio: Consuelo Ferrara is an actress, known for Il caso Moro (1986), Arcane Sorcerer (1996) and The Story of Boys & Girls (1989).
biography.name: Consuelo Ferrara

biography.bio: Donato Placido was born as Donato Alessandro Placido. He is known for his work on Romanzo Criminale (2005), Caligula (1979) and My Mother's Smile (2002).
biography.name: Donato Placido

biography.bio: Giorgio Bonora is an actor, known for In the Highest of Skies (1977), Il vostro super agente Flit (1966) and Miami Golem (1985).
biography.name: Giorgio Bonora

biography.bio: Angelo Pellegrino was born on August 2, 1946 in Palermo, Sicily, Italy as Angelo Maria Pellegrino. He is an actor, known for Malena (2000), La Cage aux Folles (1978) and 1900 (1976). He was previously married to Goliarda Sapienza.
biography.name: Angelo Pellegrino

biography.bio: Alberto Squillante is an actor, known for The Mad Dog Killer (1977), Lettomania (1976) and The Rip-Off (1977).
biography.name: Alberto Squillante
